faq-one-title: 1. How can I place an order on KiPorbo?
faq-one-content: To place an order, simply browse our website, select items, add them to your cart, and proceed to checkout.
faq-two-title: 2. Can I modify or cancel my order after placing it?
faq-two-content: Unfortunately, orders cannot be modified once placed. You may cancel within 24 hours; refer to our Order Cancellation policy.
faq-three-content: We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and secure online payment methods for a seamless shopping experience
faq-four-title: 4. How can I track my order?
faq-four-content: Once your order is dispatched, you will receive a tracking number via email to monitor your shipment's progress.
faq-five-title: 5. What is your return and exchange policy?
faq-five-content: Check our Returns & Exchanges page for details on our flexible policy and steps on how to return or exchange items.
faq-six-title: 6. How can I contact customer support?
faq-six-content: Reach out to our customer support team via the Contact Us page or email us at support@kiporbo.com for assistance.
faq-seven-title: 7. What if I receive a damaged or defective item?
faq-seven-content: Contact our customer support immediately with your order number and photos of the damaged item for prompt assistance.
faq-eight-content: Refer to our size chart for accurate measurements. If unsure, our customer service can help with sizing queries.
faq-nine-content: KiPorbo is committed to sustainable practices. We are offering people to sell their pre owned products for reselling and also new products are available for rentals too.
faq-ten-title: 10. How can I collaborate with KiPorbo?
faq-ten-content: For collaborations, partnerships, or influencer inquiries, contact our marketing team at collaborations@kiporbo.com.
